attributes.action: Life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness equality Fairness And Equal Rights For Us Uk Nationals In The Uk Visa Process
attributes.additional_details:
We Need To Make A Fairer  Equal Uk Visa System Equality For All  Uk Nationals To Apply 4 Uk Visa.s  Without Decrimination Making It Equal For Those On Low Incomes Or Out Of Work  To Be Given A Equal Fairer Footing Regarding There substantiating Circumstances  Taken Into Consideration  When Applying For A uk visa Not Unhinder But Give Us The Same Rights And Privilege As To The Rights As Uk Citizens

As The Uk Visa In It.s Present -State And Capacity Is Not On Equal Fairness And Equality To All Of Us Uk Nationals And Its Needs Changing Not Decrimination in the 21st Century As Decrimination In Any Democracy Or Society is totally unacceptable so We Need Real Real Rights As Citizens Of This Country For, Equal Rights And Fairness To Us Uk Nationals For Those On Low Incomes And Those Out Of Work To Apply For Uk Visa.s Its Time To Change This Law Of Outright Decrimination in The Present uk Visa System Right To Be Fazed Out  No More Decrimination
